original_name: Spoiled Rotten Pets with Beth Stern
plot: Former Ame's model meets the man of her dreams, a very rich Howard Stern. Stern and his superagent, Buchwald , pursue numerous projects for sweet Beth...all of which end in disaster. Can Mr. Binky save the day?
